item.title: Cisco Champion 2017
item.description: I just got the mail that i was accepted to the Cisco Champions 2017 program, this is the first year for me! What makes a Cisco Champion? Quote from Cisco.com: Passion, plus a desire to share their perspectives with the community. There are Cisco Champions all over the world. They represent a variety of segments across the IT industry. And they offer their time to help others learn about Cisco and connect with Cisco in unique ways.
